title: when i start to 'lag' my screen color gets screwed up
body:
When i start to 'lag' pretty hard my screen turns grey for a short period of time then fixes itself, it only happens when i lag, if i dont lag my screen never turns grey. Help me pls
Thanks

replies.body:
...How has nobody noticed this is something of a troll post?

What happens in the game to turn your screen grey? Dying.

What do most people blame their deaths on? Lag.


I mean, it's either a joke post or I'm just conditioned to expect somebody is trolling at all times.

Sounds like something hardware related, you might want to contact player support for some technical help.

It's possible you're overheating. Install this, play League until you 'lag', and then look at the program again and let me know what the highest number under 'max temp' is.

http://www.alcpu.com/CoreTemp/

Note: this is for Windows. Don't know a mac temperature sensor off hand but can find one for you if you're on a mac.
